name: NSCell.Attribute
desc: Constants for specifying how a button behaves when pressed and how it displays its state.

items.name: case cellAllowsMixedState
items.desc: Lets the cell’s state be NSMixedState, as well as NSOffState and NSOnState.

items.name: case changeBackgroundCell
items.desc: If the cell’s state is NSMixedState or NSOnState, changes the cell’s background color from gray to white.

items.name: case cellChangesContents
items.desc: If the cell’s state is NSMixedState or NSOnState, displays the cell’s alternate image.

items.name: case changeGrayCell
items.desc: If the cell’s state is NSMixedState or NSOnState, displays the cell’s image as darkened.

items.name: case cellDisabled
items.desc: Does not let the user manipulate the cell.

items.name: case cellEditable
items.desc: Lets the user edit the cell’s contents.

items.name: case cellHasImageHorizontal
items.desc: Controls the position of the cell’s image: places the image on the right of any text in the cell.

items.name: case cellHasImageOnLeftOrBottom
items.desc: Controls the position of the cell’s image: places the image on the left of or below any text in the cell.

items.name: case cellHasOverlappingImage
items.desc: Controls the position of the cell’s image: places the image over any text in the cell.

items.name: case cellHighlighted
items.desc: Draws the cell with a highlighted appearance.

items.name: case cellIsBordered
items.desc: Draws a border around the cell.

items.name: case cellIsInsetButton
items.desc: Insets the cell’s contents from the border.

items.name: case cellLightsByBackground
items.desc: If the cell is pushed in, changes the cell’s background color from gray to white.

items.name: case cellLightsByContents
items.desc: If the cell is pushed in, displays the cell’s alternate image.

items.name: case cellLightsByGray
items.desc: If the cell is pushed in, displays the cell’s image as darkened.

items.name: case pushInCell
items.desc: Determines whether the cell’s image and text appear to be shifted down and to the right.
